entry.title: 300 Watt LED Flood Light (1050 Watt Equivalent) 5700K, AC100-277V, Black, Waterproof Stadium Lights / Arena Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Flood Lights
Price: 403.63

This 300W LED Flood Light available in a smooth black finish is a part of LEDMyplace’s industrial, commercial and residential line of products. Built with the latest solid-state lighting technology, this luminaire is an ideal lighting solution for your outdoor illumination needs. This LED flood light comes with a lumen output of 42000 lumens, a wide beam angle of 150 x 85 degrees, a CCT of 5700K, and a CRI>70. Being broad-beamed and high-intensity lights, LED Floodlights are superior to spotlights. This LED flood light comes with U-Bracket mounting. Highly energy-efficient and durable this flood light can last a lot longer than metal-halides. This LED fixture is a UL, DLC-approved product and can easily replace up to 1050W of any metal-halide lighting fixture saving you marginally on utility bills.

entry.title: Outdoor LED Flood Light 150W, 5700K, 21,000LM, IP65 Rated, Super Bright Stadium Lights, Black, DLC Approved
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Flood Lights
Price: 214.48

This 150W LED Flood Light available in a smooth black finish is a part of LEDMyplace’s industrial, commercial and residential line of products. Built with the latest solid-state lighting technology, this luminaire is an ideal lighting solution for your outdoor illumination needs. This LED flood light comes with a lumen output of 21000 lumens, a wide beam angle of 150 x 85 degrees, a CCT of 5700K, and a CRI>70. Being broad-beamed and high-intensity lights, LED Floodlights are superior to spotlights. This LED flood light comes with yoke or knuckle mounting. Highly energy-efficient and durable this flood light can last a lot longer than metal-halides. This LED fixture is a UL, DLC-approved product and can easily replace up to 525W of any metal-halide lighting fixture saving you marginally on utility bills.
